jcr:content.jcr:title: G602 - Thundercracker
jcr:content.seoDescription: G602 Wireless Gaming Mouse redefines wireless gaming, with a 250-hour battery life and lag-free performance. Learn more about Logitech Gaming.

media_tile.text: Play with confidence. G602 sticks by you through game after game with up to 250 hours of power in Performance mode. That’s as much as 8x the battery life of other wireless gaming mice, all without compromising gaming grade sensor and connection performance. G602 is powered by two standard AA batteries, with the option to remove one battery to adjust its weight and balance.

media_tile_654806920.text: G602 delivers a lag-free experience through a 2.4 GHz wireless connection with a 2 millisecond report rate. Unlike a unifying receiver meant to connect multiple devices, G602 uses the entire bandwidth of a dedicated USB nano receiver for gaming-grade, low-latency performance. A convenient storage slot in the battery compartment keeps the nano receiver safe for transport.

media_tile_777233576.text: Achieve great results with the default configuration straight out of the box. Or, make G602 your own. Set up one-button triggers for actions that typically require digging into menus. Put push-to-talk communications in easier reach. Temporarily down-shift DPI for sniping. Reassign any game command or multi-command macro to any one of 11 programmable buttons with optional Logitech Gaming Software (LGS). Store a custom profile on-board for use with any PC.

media_tile_842265300.text: G602 is our first wireless gaming mouse to feature exclusive Delta Zero™ sensor optimizations for high-accuracy cursor control, plus battery-extending power optimization routines. Whether flying across the screen or honing in on one pixel, the 2,500 DPI sensor responds accurately to your hand movements. The LED-illuminated sensor is designed to minimize the time it takes to make quick moves in-game, whether you need to adjust your scope for sniping in FPS, select RTS units, or direct MOBA skill shots.

media_tile_1548322686.text: On-the-fly DPI shifting lets you toggle between two sensitivity settings with a click, from pixel-precise 250 DPI targeting to speedy 2,500 DPI movement. Use LGS to customize the DPI settings to fit your style of play. Also, DPI cycling lets you choose from up to five DPI settings while in-gameAdvanced features require Logitech Gaming Software, available for download at logitechg.com/downloads

media_tile_1592272073.text: G602 offers two distinct operating modes. Set the mode switch to Performance and get up to 250 hours of battery life without losing any gaming-grade capabilities. Not gaming? Switch to Endurance mode and extend the battery life even farther, up to an impressive 1,440 hours. The active mode is clearly indicated on top of the mouse: blue for Performance, green for Endurance, and blinking cyan when power finally runs low.Battery life may vary based on user, battery discharge characteristics and computing conditions

media_tile_8105204.text: With a naturally-shaped grip designed for maximum comfort over hours of use, you’ll always be the last gamer standing. DPI shift controls lie in easy reach of your index finger. Six individually sculpted side buttons are easily identifiable by touch–ready just when you need them. And slip-resistant grips around the sides improve control even through hours-long gaming sessions.

media_tile_779311277.text: Gaming conditions torture typical mice. G602 is designed to endure. Upgraded primary mechanical micro switches are rated to a 20 million-click lifespan. The low-friction polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE) feet are tested to last an amazing 250 km.

media_tile_2107533718.text: Use the optional Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) to perfectly match G602 commands to your favorite games. Simple drag-and-drop settings allow you to customize button and tracking profiles for any game you play. Or, use pre-configured customizations with automatic game detection.

_x0033_.subtext: Max. acceleration: > 20 GTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0034_.subtext: Max. speed: > 80 IPSTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0032_.subtext: Wireless report rate in HI mode: 500 Hz (1 ms)

_x0033_.subtext: Wireless report rate in LO mode: 125 Hz (8 ms)

_x0032_.subtext: PTFE Feet: 250-km rangeTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0034_.text: Battery LifeBattery life may vary based on user, battery discharge characteristics and computing conditions

_x0035_.text: Internet access for Logitech Gaming Software (optional)
